pages.text: Hammer is useful for knife blacksmithing, and other purposes.$(br2)They change how textures of certain blocks connect, such as Connectable Glass, Framed blocks, and other blocks have connecting textures.

In singleplayer, toggle their frame connection mode on place by using the 'C' key; and on Multiplayer, prevent their connections by sneaking while placing. Right-click with the hammer to change these connection modes.
